attributes.action: raise the age limit for drinking etc
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to stop antisocial behaviour, drunken pregnancy, drunken violents ect ect, then we should raise the age limit for buying,possession and consumption of alcohol from 18 to 21, and this way we will save millions yearly on the NHS, prisons and the police having to deal with the after mass of the troubles that come with our youth drinking at such a young age and in the process save the tax payer millions, which can be spent in better ways.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
